testcase.name: should link to the image of the suit and rank
should map its color to black or red based on suit
should have 52 cards
should start with aces
should end with twos
should shuffle
should load a new game
should load the score
should deal seven tableau piles of increasing piles.
should deal remainder to deck turned down.
should not deal any duplicate cards.
should deal tableau piles with last card turned up.
should allow moving first tableau's ace to first foundation
should allow moving second tableau's ace to first foundation and turns over next card in second tableau
should not allow moving third tableau's king of spades to first foundation
should not allow moving remainder's two of diamonds to first tableau's ace of clubs
, if we reverse remainder (hack the scenario) so 7 of clubs is on top, should allow moving foundation's 7 of clubs to last tableau's 8 of diamonds
should allow moving remainder to foundation
should not allow moving remainder to foundation if not next rank in suit
, tryMoveTopCardToAnyFoundation should moveCardsFrom first tableau's ace to first foundation
, tryMoveTopCardToAnyFoundation should not error on empty pile
that is empty will accept an ace
that is empty will not accept a rank other than ace
will accept next rank in same suit
will not accept same suit but not next rank
will not accept different suit
should be empty
should return undefined as the top card
, removeCard should not error
should not be empty
should return the last card as the top card
, removeCard should not error if card not in pile
, removeCard should remove card
, addTopCard should put card on top
should accept cards into the remainder
should flip the top card onto the waste
construct an empty waste pile
recycle waste cards back into remainder
turn cards down in remainder pile
reverse cards into remainder
that is empty will accept a king
that is empty will not accept a rank other than king
will accept lower rank in alternate color
will not accept lower rank in same color
will not accept different color if not next lower rank
will flip over next card if top card removed
will not error if no next card after removing top
will not error if event received to move from pile that doesn't exist
will accept all of another tableau
will accept part of another tableau
will not accept turned down part of another tableau
will not accept multiple from a pile that isn't another tableau
should start at zero
should reset score on a new game
should add 5 when waste moved to tableau
should add 10 when waste moved to foundation
should add 10 when tableau moved to foundation
should subtract 15 when foundation moved to tableau
should add nothing when foundation moved to foundation
should add nothing when tableau moved to tableau
should add 5 when tableau card turned over because top was removed
should not add 5 when tableau card already turned over
should subtract 100 when waste recycled
should not go negative when waste recycled
